FTE-R.BK.summary: Firetrade Engineering Public Company Limited designs, sells, installs, repairs, and maintains fire protection equipment and systems in Thailand. The company operates in two segments, Sales of Fire Protection Equipment and Systems, and Project Works and Services. Its products include fire protection equipment and valves, sprinklers and nozzles, grooved coupling and fitting products, fire extinguishers, cold water and sanitary valves, and monitors, as well as clean agent fire suppression, water mist, fire alarm, ASD and linear heat detection, foam, kitchen fire protection, and fire pump systems. The company's products are used in kitchens, server rooms, flammable storage rooms, factories, museums, banks, buildings, etc. Firetrade Engineering Public Company Limited was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

GRDAF.summary: Guardforce AI Co., Limited offers cash solutions and cash handling services in Thailand. The company's services include cash-in-transit, vehicles to banks, ATM management, cash center operations, cash processing, coin processing, and cheque center services, as well as cash deposit machine solutions comprising cash deposit management and express cash services. Its customers include local commercial banks, chain retailers, coin manufacturing mints, and government authorities. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

HARN-R.BK.long_name: Harn Engineering Solutions Public Company Limited
HARN-R.BK.summary: Harn Engineering Solutions Public Company Limited engages in the wholesale, retail, repair, renting, leasing, contracting, and installation of fire protection systems and fire suppression agents in Thailand. The company offers sprinklers, fire hose cabinets, floor control valves, pump room, and fire extinguishers for fire protection and safety solutions; and compressors, unit coolers, controllers, inverters, condensing units, refrigerants, and fans for refrigeration, as well as cooling system controlling devices. It also provides air-conditioning and sanitary solutions, such as chillers, cooling towers, PICV, and air handling and fan coil units; and digital printing solutions, including coding and marking solutions, variable QR/2D coding solutions, digital color label press solutions, and after sales services, as well as 3D printers, software packages, scanners, and printing services. In addition, the company is involved in the trading of cold storage devices; and trading, repairing, and renting of printing equipment. The company was formerly known as Fire Victor Public Company Limited and changed its name to Harn Engineering Solutions Public Company Limited in November 2016. Harn Engineering Solutions Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2001 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KUMWEL-R.BK.summary: Kumwell Corporation Public Company Limited engages in the production and distribution of electrical equipment, graphite molds, metal powders, and ground wires in Thailand and internationally. The company provides grounding and lightning protection systems. It offers exothermic welding products, such as connections, powders, molds, handle clamps, ignitors, and tools and accessories; grounding components, including ground rods, pits, and plates, as well as ground monitoring systems, grounding clamps, MEG, and accessories and tools; and lightning protection components comprising connection components, conductor and earth electrodes, isolating spark gaps, conductor fasteners, earth electrode inspection housings, lightning strike counters, earthing enhancing compounds, and high voltage cables. The company also provides surge protective devices for AC and DC power systems, photovoltaic systems, and data/signal lines; isolating spark gaps for equipotential bonding; and lightning and surge counters; lightning detection warning systems; measuring devices consisting of clamp and double clamp earth resistance testers, earth impulse impedance, and remote ground monitoring systems; electric arc protection systems; and copper lugs, C-clamp connectors, and related tools and accessories. It serves the electricity, industrial, transportation, telecommunication, and building sectors. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PHOL-R.BK.summary: Phol Dhanya Public Company Limited distributes occupational safety, health, and environment products in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Trading in Health and Safety Products, Water Treatment System, and Water Supply Systems for Villages. It offers personal protection equipment, including respirator, hand, hearing, face, and hand protection products, as well as firefighting suits, protective cloths, hearing protection, and safety shoes and glasses; and workplace safety equipment, such as system containment systems, emergency showers, portable ventilators, positive respirators, fall protection products, measurement products, leak and spill controls, and lockout tagouts. The company also provides cleanroom products, including swaps, sticky rollers, cleanroom bonds, and wipers; and clean agents and PPE vending machine. In addition, it is involved in the production, distribution, and service of water treatment systems, industrial water treatment systems, and water purifiers; and production and distribution of water in the form of concessions to the government and private sector. Phol Dhanya Public Company Limited was founded in 1961 and is headquartered in Pathumthani, Thailand.
